It's INSANE That Kyrie Irving Didn't Make the All-Star Team | Dallas Mavericks Podcast
Kyrie Irving's All-Star snub sparks debate. Hosts discuss his stats, team impact, and compare him to other selections. Plus, Mavs' interest in potential trades.
